name: cfexchangefolder
description: Lets you perform various actions on the mail folder, such as get folder information, find folders, or create, copy, modify, move, delete, and empty the contents of a folder.

params.name: connection
params.description: The name of the connection to the Exchange server, as specified in the `cfexchangeconnection` tag.

params.name: uid
params.description: (getInfo/getExtendedInfo) UID that is used to identify the folder in which the actions are performed.

params.name: name
params.description: (getInfo/getExtendedInfo/findSubFolders) The name of the ColdFusion query variable that contains the returned information about the folder.

params.name: folderID
params.description: (getInfo/getExtendedInfo/findSubFolders/delete/modify/empty) UID that is used to identify the folder in which the actions are performed.

params.name: folderPath
params.description: (getInfo/getExtendedInfo) Full path to the folder where the action has to be performed.

params.name: pathDelimiter
params.description: (getInfo/getExtendedInfo) Lets you specify the delimiter that is used to separate the folders.

params.name: result
params.description: (create/copy/move) The name of a query variable that contains the result returned from the exchange server when one of the action is performed.

params.name: destinationFolderID
params.description: (copy/move) A case-sensitive Exchange UID value that uniquely identifies the destination folder.

params.name: sourceFolderID
params.description: (copy/move) The UID that is used to identify the folder from which you copy or move folders to the destination folder.

params.name: deleteType
params.description:
(delete/move) - hardDelete: Removes a folder permanently from the Exchange server.
- softDelete: Moves a folder to the dumpster in Exchange server, if dumpster is enabled.
- moveToDeletedItems: Moves a folder to the deleted items folder.

params.name: folder
params.description: (create/modify) A struct that contains the required information of the folder that has to be created or modified, such as display name and folder class.

examples.title: Get folder
examples.description: Gets the extended information for the Inbox folder.
examples.code:
<cfexchangeconnection action="open" username="conv" password="Password" server="IP_Address" serverversion="2010" connection="conn1">
<cfexchangefolder action="getextendedinfo" connection="conn1" name="result" folderpath="Inbox">
<cfdump var="#result#">
